@@ -0,0 +1,16 @@
+! { dg-do run }
+!
+! Allocatable scalar corrays were mishandled (ICE)
+!
+type t
+  integer, allocatable :: caf[:]
+end type t
+type(t) :: a
+allocate (a%caf[3:*])
+a%caf = 7
+!print *, a%caf
+if (a%caf /= 7) call abort ()
+if (any (lcobound (a%caf) /= [ 3 ]) &
+    .or. ucobound (a%caf, dim=1) /= this_image ()+2)  &
+  call abort ()
+end
